movie.title: Playing Away
movie.description_intro: To mark the conclusion of their "Third World Week" celebration, a cricket team in a small English village invites a black cricket team from South London to a charity game with comical results.
movie.description_full: To mark the conclusion of their "Third World Week" celebration, a cricket team in a small English village invites a black cricket team from South London to a charity game with comical results.

movies.title: Suburban Commando
movies.summary: Shep Ramsey is an interstellar hero, righting wrongs, et cetera. His ship is damaged after a fight with an interstellar nasty, and he must hide out on Earth until it can recharge. He leaves his power suit at home, but still finds himself unable to allow wrongs to go unrighted, and so mixes it up with bad drivers, offensive paperboys, muggers and the like. Then the family, with which he's staying, finds his power suit, and the father tries it on.
movies.description_full: Shep Ramsey is an interstellar hero, righting wrongs, et cetera. Then the family, with which he's staying, finds his power suit, and the father tries it on.

movies.title: Psych: The Movie
movies.summary: The old gang comes together during the holidays after a mystery assailant targets one of their own.
movies.description_full: The old gang comes together during the holidays after a mystery assailant targets one of their own.
movies.synopsis: The old gang comes together during the holidays after a mystery assailant targets one of their own.

movies.title: Homesitters
movies.summary: After accidentally blowing up the place they're supposed to be looking after, Annabelle and Simon join forces with a narcoleptic cat burglar and rob a bunch of houses to fund their escape into the wider world.
movies.description_full: After accidentally blowing up the place they're supposed to be looking after, Annabelle and Simon join forces with a narcoleptic cat burglar and rob a bunch of houses to fund their escape into the wider world.
movies.synopsis: After accidentally blowing up the place they're supposed to be looking after, Annabelle and Simon join forces with a narcoleptic cat burglar and rob a bunch of houses to fund their escape into the wider world.

movies.title: Project A
movies.summary: In late 19th Century Hong Kong the British may rule the land, but the pirates rule the waters. Reluctantly, the Coast Guard is given money to fight these pirates, but the pirates themselves have many contacts (that is, bribed officials) in the government, and seek to thwart the Coast Guard's efforts to eliminate them. One Coast Guard officer is Dragon Ma, who is determined that his beloved Coast Guard will not be made fools of.
